p: Folinâ€“Ciocalteu reagent (FCR), 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT), gallic acid (GA), 1,1-diphenyl-2-picryl-hydroxyl (DPPH), quercetin (QE), almunium chloride (AlCl 3), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) and HPLC grade methanol were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich St. Louis, Mo., USA). Other analytical grade solvents and chemicals were procured locally.
